desc: A padded lacrosse stick for beginner players to learn how to play lax safe and fun for all ages to try the sport. We put the lacrosse equipment on your stick. Play safe and have fun children beginners adults and family. Mini Lacrosse Game for backyard on grass sand beach ice even the pool. Hockey is next. Rallee Sports

layout.text: We put the pads on your stick so you don't have to gear up to play Lacrosse. The only way to safely play a friendly game of lax in your best pair of jeans. A pickup game anytime, ANYWHERE.
